page.title: 15SHOPPING IN BOTLEY.
page.content: Most people in Botley do their shopping somewhere else like Tescos in Bursledon or Hedge End.But they do some shopping in Botley for bread, meat and vegetables.Botley grocery prices aren't too expensive.The clothes shops are expensive especially for young people.But Upfields (who deal in electrical appliances) have very reasonable prices.Meat is dearer in Botley but better quality.There are two markets in Botley one on Friday morning and one on Saturday morning.There are Antique fairs occasionally at the Botley centre.There is a shop in Botley called Sperrings which stays open late til 9.00p.m. and is open on Sundays.
